title: Voice Configuration
lede: Configure voice settings, providers, and speech parameters for your AI agents.

sections.title: Voice Providers
sections.content:
Choose from multiple voice providers to find the perfect voice for your agent.

Supported Providers:

  • OpenAI: Natural-sounding voices with multiple models
  • ElevenLabs: High-quality cloned and synthetic voices
  • Azure: Microsoft's neural voice technology
  • Google: WaveNet and Neural2 voices

sections.title: Speech Parameters
sections.content:
Fine-tune how your agent speaks with these parameters:

  • Speed: Control speaking pace
  • Pitch: Adjust voice tone
  • Stability: Balance consistency vs. expressiveness
  • Similarity: Voice similarity enhancement

metaTitle: Voice Configuration - Set Up AI Voice Settings | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Configure voice providers, models, and speech settings for your AI agents. Support for OpenAI, ElevenLabs, and more.
metaKeywords: voice configuration, TTS, text-to-speech, voice models, OpenAI voices, ElevenLabs, speech synthesis
